friday.title: Vesper
friday.description: Themed "Destined," this youth retreat is aimed to help you discover your destiny. From a Christ centered approach, we'll discuss topics of: life direction, character building, and practical living. Participate in engaging lectures, sermonettes, and workshops. Also, enjoy physical and hands-on activities such as: hiking, cooking, and wellness pursuits.

friday.title: Convoy travel to Labelle
friday.task: Make sure all those who are joining the convoy are present all along the way. Each car will have a walkie talkie, provided by coms team.
friday.description: Address: 301 Rue de la Montagne Labelle QC J0T 1H0 Canada. Travelling to Labelle in convoy. Leaving at 7pm. Expected arrival time: 9pm.

saturday.title: Sabbath School
saturday.task: Sabbath school lesson for the week or 'Where am I?' sermonette.

saturday.title: Nature Walk
saturday.description: Short nature walk along the trail in the woods behind the chalet.
saturday.task: Take everyone for a walk in the woods behind the chalet. Make groups and set a head and a tail.

saturday.title: Book binding activity
saturday.description: We're going to make our own personalized notebooks!

saturday.title: Gym
saturday.description: Labelle Centre Community: 29 Rue du Couvent, Labelle, QC J0T 1H0.</br></br>We will travel together to the local gym in convoy. Ride in the car you came in.
saturday.task: Get everyone to the gym in convoy. Bring sports equipment.

sunday.title: Understanding Myself & Others
sunday.description: Understanding myself & others - personality test & life builder

sunday.title: Game night & Hot chocolate / Tea time!
sunday.description: We're going to spend some time together playing games.
sunday.task: Prepare a game or games or movie

monday.title: Hiking & Resolution
monday.description: Sentier Montagne-Verte: 3050 Chem. du Lac Baptiste, Labelle, QC J0T 1H0. </br></br>We will travel together to the hiking spot. Ride in the car you came in.</br></br>Atop the mountain, we will have a concluding discussion. We'll summarize the weekend and discuss points of interest. Let us know what you liked and didn't like about the retreat so we can improve the next!
monday.task: Get everyone to the hiking spot in convoy. Make sure all know we are not returning to the chalet.

monday.title: Convoy travel to Montreal
monday.description: Travelling to Montreal in convoy. Leaving at 5pm. Expected arrival: 7pm.

saturday.title: Butterfly Effect
saturday.description: What should I offer to society, and what does society offer me?
saturday.task: Prepare a sermon for the Saturday service. There will be music, scripture reading, and some other activities. Your sermon doesn't need to be any longer than 20mins.</br></br> Send the verse for scripture reading to Myra (presider).

saturday.title: Ladies & Gentlemen (Ladies)
saturday.description: How to own womanhood: What it means to be a woman, and how to gacefully optimize womanhood.
saturday.task: Prepare a lecture & workshop about 'owning womanhood.'

monday.title: Management - Time & Money
monday.description: How to manage your time & money. Practical guides to being effective and efficient with your money and time.
monday.task: Prepare a lecture & workshop about managing time and managing money.

general: Manage everything location for the event

friday.title: Destined Kick-off
friday.description: Vesper Kick-off: Destined 2023. God has a plan for your life, even before you were born.
friday.task: Prepare a sermonette about how God has a plan for each one of us. And ultimately, we're included in the plan of salvation; in that our destination is by his side in heaven.

sunday.title: Evening Devotional 3
sunday.description: My body is a temple (part 2). Why is my body is a temple, and why should I treat it as such?
sunday.task: Short devotional about how our body is a temple, and that we ought to present ourselves a living sacrifice. Touch more on the biblical theory behind this idea, and why it's important.

saturday.title: Morning Devotional 1
saturday.description: Salvation is personal, life experience is unique, and we are all at different stages! Invite Jesus to be by your side.
saturday.task: Prepare a devotional on this topic. It doesn't need to be any longer than 15 minutes.

saturday.title: Ladies & Gentlemen (Gentlemen)
saturday.description: How to own manhood: What it means to be a man, and how to valiantly optimize manhood.
saturday.task: Prepare a lecture & workshop about 'owning manhood.'

monday.title: Gardening & Diet
monday.description: Learn the basics of gardening & how to maintain a healthy diet.
monday.task: Prepare a lecture &/ workshop about gardening and diet.

saturday.title: Evening Devotional 2
saturday.description: Being and joining uplifting company. Propelling each other forward.
saturday.task:
Prepare a devotional on this topic. It doesn't need to be any longer than 15 minutes.

You can find reference in the EGW devotional Sons and Daughters: June 3-5.

name: Guido Clement
role: Health & Safety Coordinator, and Workshop Facilitator

friday.title: Safe arrival
friday.description: It will be dark upon arrival. You will need to setup flood lights and direct cars to safe parking one by one.

friday.title: Set up campsite upon arrival
friday.description: Set up the tents according to how many we need.

sunday.title: My Body is a Temple
sunday.description: My body is a temple (part 1). Health & Wellness: build the dream lifestyle (write up schedules & establish routine). A practical heavy workshop.
sunday.task: Prepare a short lecture on this topic. It doesn't need to be any longer than 15 minutes. The activity of lifestyle building will take most of the time.

monday.title: Pack campsite up
monday.description: Pack up the campsite and kits.

sunday.title: Effective Decision Making
sunday.description: How do I know what God's will is? Tips and steps to effective decision making.
sunday.task: Introduce yourself in relation to what you are presenting, then present a lecture and facilitate an activity/discussion points on this topic. Emphasize on making decisions based on God's will and how to know His will.

general: Gentlemens's superintendent for Sunday night to Monday morning

sunday.title: Interpersonal Proficiency
sunday.description: How to effectively communicate with others & form long lasting connections.
sunday.task: Introduce yourself in relation to what you are presenting, then present a lecture and facilitate an activity/discussion points on this topic.

monday.title: Morning Devotional 3
monday.description: We are the Salt!: Excellence, diligence, reliability, and effectiveness.
monday.task:
Prepare a devotional on this topic. It doesn't need to be any longer than 15 minutes.

You can find reference in the EGW devotional Sons and Daughters, May 27.

general: Design the poster, invitations, tickets, and guest speaker pamphlets.

sunday.title: Morning Devotional 2
sunday.description: A Stellar Character - Morning Devotional 2. There's a trove of blessings in developing an outstanding and robust character.
sunday.task:
Prepare a devotional on this topic. It doesn't need to be any longer than 15 minutes.

You can find reference in the EGW devotional Sons and Daughters, May 28.

saturday.title: Divine service
saturday.description: Divine service. Myra's presiding. Marc Lovem is speaking. You are doing the music.
saturday.task: Prepare a jam session for the service (perhaps a medley). Have some music for about 10 minutes. Then there will be scripture reading. Then more music for about 5 minutes. Then the sermon. Then more music at the end, maybe 3 songs.

general: Prepare jam sessions for the event
coordinate short song service for vesper, and each morning and evening devotional
prepare playlists for the event (background music) not necessarily all christian; can include classical music.
